thread.title: Meal with a view! Romantic floating restaurant opens in China's Zhejiang Province... but it's only accessible via boat transfer
thread.title_full: Meal with a view! Romantic floating restaurant opens in China's Zhejiang Province... but it's only accessible via boat transfer | Daily Mail Online

author: Katie Amey for MailOnline
title: Meal with a view! Romantic floating restaurant opens in China's Zhejiang Province... but it's only accessible via boat transfer
text:
View
comments
For anyone in search of a truly unique dining experience, look no further.
In the city of Lin'an in the Zhejiang Province of China, a brand new floating restaurant has opened for business.
The city's high levels of rainfall, warm evenings and mountainous scenery make it a particularly picturesque location for a romantic dinner - especially given the area's abundance of lakes from which to take in the forested scenery.
Although the province itself borders the East China Sea, the city is actually located further inland, though it does boast two nature reserves and two sanctioned scenic areas.
The restaurant, which is fashioned out of a wooden floating dock, looks to only be able to accommodate parties of two, making it the ideal location to celebrate a special anniversary or event with a loved one.
Nearby, a boat, which is used to ferry the guests to their floating island, is anchored. Presumably, this is also where the waitstaff and chef prepare the dishes that the customers will eat.
One thing's for sure: you can't beat the view at this intimate eatery.
In the city of Lin'an in the Zhejiang Province of China, a brand new - and very romantic - floating restaurant has opened for business
 Next America's 'germiest' wall, a Stonehenge replica made... Croatia is heating up: Little-known island of Losinj set to... Leg it to Legoland: A stay inside the resort's... Situated in the middle of a picturesque lake, the southern Chinese restaurant appears to only be able to accommodate parties of two
A boat, which brings the two diners to their floating wooden platform, remains anchored nearby so that waitstaff can serve the couple
From the illuminated wooden dock, the couple can take in the breathtaking views of the area, much of which is covered in lush forest
A couple enjoys their romantic meal, complete with candles and red wine, while floating in the middle of a large body of water
